Protocols/PopFormPickerViewDataSource.ht.name: content

Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.name: placeholderTextColor
Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: the font of the field’s placeHolder text

Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.name: textFieldHeight
Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: the height of the field’s content if a UITextField

Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.name: textViewHeight
Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: the height of the field’s content if a UITextView

Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.name: errorColor
Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: the color of the error’s text to be shown to a user when the field’s validation fails

Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.name: focusedColor
Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: the color of the textfield’s text when the field is selected

Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.name: cursorColor
Protocols/PopFormFieldTheme.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: the color of the textfield’s cursor when the field is selected

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: validationRule
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: The ValidationRule’s of the field. Set to nil for optional fields

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: keyboardType
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: The Keyboard type that should be presented when the field becomes first responder.

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: apiKey
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: an api key for the field MUST BE UNIQUE TO EACH FIELD ON A SINGLE FORM

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: isSecureEntry
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: If the field should have secure entry

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: returnKey
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: The return key type for the field.

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: autoCapitilization
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: The Capitilization of the textfield defaults to .none

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: datePickerWithDataSource
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: If not nil will set the input of the textField to a datePicker

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: pickerViewWithDataSource
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: If not nil will set the input of the textField to a custom pickerView

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: prefilledText
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: set this when unwinding from another screen

Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.name: isTextView
Protocols/PopFormFieldDataSource.html#/s.abstract: set this to use a UITextView instead of a UITextField for the form’s field

Protocols/PopFormDatePickerDataSource.ht.name: startDate
Protocols/PopFormDatePickerDataSource.ht.abstract: the start date that the pickerView will be set to

Protocols/PopFormDatePickerDataSource.ht.name: restrictedDateRange
Protocols/PopFormDatePickerDataSource.ht.abstract: the date range to restrict the date picker to

Protocols/PopFormDatePickerDataSource.ht.name: shouldPrefillStartDate
Protocols/PopFormDatePickerDataSource.ht.abstract: will set the textfield’s text on load instead of on didbeginediting

Protocols/PopFormDatePickerDataSource.ht.name: formatForDisplayedDate
Protocols/PopFormDatePickerDataSource.ht.abstract: how the displayed date should be formatted

Protocols/PopFormPickerViewDataSource.ht.abstract: The Datasource passed to a field containing a pickerview
